body: This nose ring seems to be braided from five platinum strands. It grants its wearer the scent ability along with a +4 competence bonus on Perception checks involving smell and on Survival checks to track using scent.
name: Hunter's Nose Ring
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Gnolls/New Rules/Gnoll Magic Items/Hunters Nose Ring

Construction Requirements.descriptor: 5,000 gpCraft Wondrous Item, bloodhound, platinum ring worth 250 gp
